name: Bouquet 1
description: A lovely hand-picked bouquet perfect for any occasion.
longDescription: This beautiful tulip bouquet is carefully crafted with the finest seasonal flowers. Each arrangement is hand-tied by our expert florists and comes with a personalized gift card. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or just to brighten someone's day.
